info.name: Android Dynamic Code Loading Detection

info.description: Identifies the absence of common anti-reverse engineering techniques, such as anti-debugging, tamper detection, integrity verification, and obfuscation.

info.name: Android SQL Injection Detection
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects improper neutralization of special elements in SQL commands, which can lead to SQL injection vulnerabilities.

info.name: Android Path Traversal Vulnerability
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory, which may lead to path traversal attacks.

info.name: Android Sensitive Data in Log Files - Strict
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects logging of sensitive information, such as passwords, tokens, or API keys, which can expose user credentials or other secrets.

info.name: Missing JWT Signature Verification
author: mohammad
info.description:
Detects missing or improper JWT signature verification in Android applications.
Skipping JWT signature validation allows attackers to forge tokens and bypass authentication.

info.name: Android Smali Command Execution Detection - Strict
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects command execution vulnerabilities in Smali code, including Runtime.exec() and ProcessBuilder usage, focusing on cases where user input or dynamic data is used in command execution.

info.name: Android Smali Broadcast Receiver - Strict Improper Intent Verification
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects Broadcast Receivers that retrieve intent data without proper validation, which may lead to security risks such as Intent Spoofing.

info.name: Android Obfuscation Detection (ProGuard, R8, DexGuard)
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects signs of code obfuscation in Smali files, including shortened class/method names, excessive reflection, and unusual string encryption patterns.

info.name: Missing Anti-Reverse Engineering Mechanisms
author: mohammad
info.description: Identifies the absence of common anti-reverse engineering techniques, such as anti-debugging, tamper detection, integrity verification, and obfuscation.

info.name: Android Weak PRNG Seed Initialization
author: mohammad
info.description:
Detects weak seed initialization for `SecureRandom`, which may lead to predictable random number generation.
Using predictable seeds (e.g., time-based seeds) makes the PRNG outputs guessable.

info.name: Android Path Traversal Vulnerability
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory, which may lead to path traversal attacks.

info.name: Android Insecure Random Number Generation
author: mohammad
info.description: Detects the use of insecure random number generators, which may lead to predictable values.

info.name: Missing JWT Signature Verification
author: mohammad
info.description:
Detects missing or improper JWT signature verification in Android applications.
Skipping JWT signature validation allows attackers to forge tokens and bypass authentication.

info.description: Detects the use of insecure random number generators, which may lead to predictable values.

info.name: Missing JWT Signature Verification
author: mohammad
info.description:
Detects missing or improper JWT signature verification in Android applications.
Skipping JWT signature validation allows attackers to forge tokens and bypass authentication.

info.name: Android Obfuscation Detection (ProGuard, R8, DexGuard)
author: mohammad
